text:
Inscene Company | Utrecht, The Netherlands | Junior Developer | Partial Onsite/Remote | Interns can also apply

For Networkapp (http://www.networkapp.eu) and related apps we are looking for a junior developer. Depending on your experience you will work on either the app (C#) or backend (Python)

Inscene Company has a small team and you will be able to make a significant impact on the product.

There is some flexibility in hours e.g. part-time work.

It's possible to work remotely, but regular (at least weekly) office visits are expected.

We also have a position for one or two interns on related projects.
